name: pro0
description: A simpler, better agent harness - alternative to oh-my-opencode

scripts.build: tsc && npm run copy-assets && rm -rf dist/agents && cp -r agents dist/
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/skills/bundled/qmd dist/skills/bundled/deepthink && cp src/skills/bundled/qmd/skill.json src/skills/bundled/qmd/*.md dist/skills/bundled/qmd/ && cp src/skills/bundled/deepthink/skill.json src/skills/bundled/deepthink/*.md dist/skills/bundled/deepthink/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
